subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.

"> If it can't get it correct, I suppose that brings into suspect all its o=
ther answers."

All that really does is rule out psychic interference from =
you and the operator. So that would say nothing either way about all its ot=
her answers.


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rick 
  To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, April 15, 2009 2:24 PM
  Subject: [EVP-=
ITC] Re: An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.






  Anyone hav=
e any luck with this calibration experiment?

  (Note this experiment isn't=
 for anyone who just likes to play around with their board, and doesn't rea=
lly care to know its accuracy. This is for those interested in determining =
how well their board approach works).

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "R=
ick" <rasterer@...> wrote:
  >
  > If anyone feels like calibrating their b=
oard, or wants to know if they can get accurate information from it, I have=
 written down a number between 1 and a billion (1,000,000,000)
  > 
  > Let=
 me know what your board thinks it is. 
  > If it gets it correct, sounds l=
ike you've got something important going on there!
  > 
  > If it can't get=
 it correct, I suppose that brings into suspect all its other answers.
  > =

  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "threadsintyme@" <=
Threadsintyme@> wrote:
  > >
  > > Hi Lori,
  > > Glad that you brought thi=
s up! A true medium can give you a lot of the details that Ouija boards can=
't. They can also give you complete names, dates, info that is totally unkn=
own to others (except for those directly involved). 
  > > There are some e=
xcellent readings on YouTube and I don't mean the crappy ones...I forgot wh=
at this one guy's name was (he is in spirit now) but he could tel you detai=
ls!! I almost my skin chill...
  > > I will see if I can locate some of tho=
se highly respected members of Spiritualism and will post those here for al=
l of you to watch.
  > > Blessings,
  > > Al
  > > 
  > > ---------- Origin=
al Message ----------
  > > From: lori bogren <loribogren@>
  > > To: <evp-=
itc@yahoogroups.com>

al ghost hunter stuff.

  > > 
 =
 > > 
  > > 
  > > 
  > > April~
  > > 
  > > You forgot yawn from boredom,=
 that's what I do.
  > > 
  > > Use it, don't use it. I don't care. But why=
 bother. When people ask me I usually suggest that if they want to communic=
ate with ... whatever why not develop the ability yourself. - ya, I'm one o=
f those who believe anyone can.
  > > 
  > > There's always the question in=
 the back of your mind whether your partner's moving it. The intentions of =
"what" you are talking to. Not to mention it's too slow and limited.
  > > =

  > > Besides if you take the time to develop the ability you can get more=
 texture in the information. Asking the board "where you married?" may get =
you a "yes" but a psychic might get the sense of a religious or civil cerem=
onhy, the garment(s) worn, other's in the party, or whether that Being appr=
oved/disapproved of their spouse (ie was it a reluctant union).
  > > 
  > =
> ~Lori
  > > 
  > > "My life is boring, my fantasies are a theme park." --=
Anne Rice Responding to an interviewer who just did not get it.
